title: Communities
content:
Forums & Clubs

Get out and meet other nut-jobs offroading their subarus!

TypeNameDescriptionLink
ClubMtn RooOffroad subaru group with chapters all over the world Link
ClubNW Washington OffroadThe video above is of this club on a normal outing. If you live close, go do some serious wheeling with these guys. Link
ClubPNW OffroadOregon Based Offroad Club Link
ForumUltimate SubaruThey have TONS of writeups on offroad builds Link
ForumNASIOCNorth American Subaru Impreza Owners ClubLink
sub-redditr/battlewagonMostly just lifted wagon pics, great source of build inspirationLink
